stvendofqueue:
Thanks for testing tech articles! That's all we have for this platform for now.
Try switching platforms or check out the Community Dashboard for more ways to help.
stvnofeedbacktext: Uh oh. Please let us know what happened:
stvnofeedbacktextsecond: Optional questions, please answer if you can:
stvnofeedbackmodeltext: What type of device are you using?
stvnofeedbackmodeltextplaceholder: Eg: iPhone X, Galaxy S7, or Windows PC
stvnofeedbackversiontext: What version of $1 are you using?
stvnofeedbackversiontextplaceholder: Eg: iOS12, Android Oreo, or Windows 10
stvtestinginstructionstext:
To test this article on your iOS device:
  • Make sure your device is updated to the latest OS.
  • Read the article carefully and try every step on your device. (Note: if a part or method only applies to a different platform, such as Android or Windows, then skip that part or method.)
  • When you have tested the entire article, use the buttons at the bottom of the page to record your results.
stvtestingtext: Does this article work on your device?
stvleaderboardtitle: Top Tech Testing User - Last 7 Days
stvlogentryvote: Action '$2' on Tech Testing for [[$1]] on platform $3 on batch $4
stvplatformselect: What platform do you want to test on?
stvverificationtext: That was quick! Did you try every step in this article relating to $1 and confirm that they all worked perfectly?
stvchooseplatformbottom: Not finding an article you like? Change Platform
stv_bad_visuals: The visuals didn't show the right thing
stv_bad_steps_and_visuals: Both the steps and the visuals are wrong
stv_bad_topic: There's something wrong with the topic itself
stva_save_bad: Something went wrong saving this batch.
